Text: giati den mporo na katebaso tipota?

Given the size, I was surprised how good this looks.  It looked great on my 60 inch DLP, much better than the 1.37 GB from sadwabang, which is jerky.  Sound is clearer in this one too, though it's only stereo; this movie doesn't really require 5.1
